message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive offer is valid for the next 3 days. We believe this price reflects the value and quality of the product, and we are confident it will meet your expectations.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $950,000 is unfortunately outside my budget.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. This is a fair price given the value I place on it. I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of our product. In light of your offer, I am willing to consider a middle ground. I would like to propose a price of $900,000 for the product. This is a slight increase from my initial offer, reflecting the value of the product, while still being mindful of your budget constraints. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you and look forward to your response.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While $900,000 is closer, it's still a bit out of reach for me.  I'm firm on my previous offer of $850,000.  I believe this is a fair price given the value we both place on this product.  Let's see if we can finalize a deal at this point.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to lower the price to $875,000 for the product. This is a significant reduction from my original asking price, reflecting the importance of closing this deal. I believe this price is fair, considering the value of the product to both of us. I hope this revised offer will facilitate our transaction.

Alice,  we're getting closer. While I appreciate your concession, $875,000 is still a little too high. I'm willing to pay $860,000 for the product, which reflects the value I place on it.  This is a fair price, and I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement at this point.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to meet you halfway. I propose a final offer of $865,000 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product and is a reasonable compromise. I hope this will help us reach an agreement.
